'''Mega Mystifying Samachurl Statue''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Mega Mystifying Samachurl Statue is obtained from the [[Journey Through Hilinigmatic Terrain]] event.
